summary: The diff implements all four requirements: REQ-36 updates MCQ marks to 1 mark throughout the system (backend category renamed to mcqOneMark, frontend displays updated accordingly); REQ-37 fixes paper preview by implementing automatic navigation after generation; REQ-38 adds success popup in AddQuestion.tsx with question count after bulk upload; REQ-39 adds success popup in GeneratePaper.tsx with automatic navigation to preview. All acceptance criteria appear to be addressed based on the available code changes.
